app.title: Create your Password Manager
info.left: Save all your passwords, data or any information here, forget paper notes and unprotected applications.
info.right: Create your master key: Only you can access your secrets with it.
info.howDesc: First, you must create a different password for your electronic belongings. You will not be able to recover your password, so remember it well.
info.whatDesc: For example, the number of your card, the PIN and the PUK of your mobile phone, the serial number of any of your devices or any information you need to have in a safe place.
info.consentDesc: I am of legal age and I agree that you treat my data according to the data protection policy
cpass.intro: First, you must create a different password for your electronic belongings. You will not be able to recover your password, so remember it well.
cpass.youCan: You can also create a hint that helps you remember your master password.
cpass.createHint: Create your hint to remember your password (optional)
feedback.success.title: Your Password Manager is already created!
feedback.success.desc: Enjoy all the features of Password Manger
feedback.error.title: There was an error
feedback.error.desc: We were unable to modify your Master Password. Try again later
